thread.title: Team Colson
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Team Colson

author: Team Colson
title: Team Colson
text: I have had a large, old 8-pane window for more than 10 years that I wanted to use to frame photos. I had custom mats Quote: d from several different places on numerous occasions, and it was never within my price range. In fact, I was to the point of considering purchasing a mat cutter and doing it myself! After a year or more since last getting a Quote: , I happened upon mat boards & more. Not only could they cut my mats the exact dimensions I needed (to the 8th inch!) the price was less than half than the lowest price I'd ever received previously!! They arrived in a matter of days and they are perfect! I'm a creative type, so people often ask me about frames and mats-- I will definitely be recommending this place!
